Posts.EditableText:
Thanks Stephen. I'm happy for people to update the wiki - I keep an eye on all changes so you'll soon find out whether I approve or not!

Regarding the Javascript item, that's a placeholder for me to document the <javascript> tag which lets you specify which .js files to embed. I don't think we should be documenting Javascript itself on the wiki though as there's the rest of the internet for that - the wiki entry should just be about how it relates specifically to Quest, and I'm probably the best person to document that right now (although you're welcome to poke around the source code to figure things out if you like!)
